title: Disconnection during Ranked Lobby
body:
Hello thanks for coming here, anyways. I just had my league of legends freeze on me, i spoke to my teammates before it froze. what i saw. 
I picked top, i was middle of the team, we picked our bans, then it went to Picks. then my screen turned black, and disconnected from the lobby, i reconnected went back into the room, The ADC did not pick a champion and the countdown was stuck at 0, i was stuck there for over 5 mins and decided to restart the Client, BUT I GET THE QUE DODGE WAITING TIME WHY!!!! seriously. I dont know if it counts as a loss in placement but what the fuck super lame

replies.body: It sounds like your network may have lost connection to the server and caused you to lose sync.  If you're still having this issue, our [connection issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide should get you fixed up.  I recommend troubleshooting in custom games to prevent any penalties.  Let me know if you still have any issue after!
